description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Platform Hack is mashup of a hack and slash RPG with a platform jumper.  Explore massive maze-like worlds to slay enemies, find keys and unlock doors, all while jumping, dodge and swinging over chasms and past traps.
description.short: Platform Hack is mashup of a hack and slash RPG with a platform jumper.  Explore massive maze-like worlds to slay enemies, find keys and unlock doors, all while jumping, dodge and swinging over chasms and past traps.
